name: Shukrani's Triumph
flavorText: The inhuman organ set into the center of this mojo once belonged to the demon Zagraal. At the end of a titanic battle during which all of her fellows were slain, the surviving witch doctor carved the still-beating heart from the fallen demon. Mounting it in a spirit cage, Shukrani harnessed the dark power of the heart that she might stride the realm of Mbwiru Eikura unchallenged.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
Increases Mana Regeneration by [12.00 - 14.00] per Second
primary.text: Increases Mana Regeneration by [12.00 - 14.00] per Second

secondary.textHtml: Spirit Walk lasts until you attack or until an enemy is within 30 yards of you. (Witch Doctor Only)
secondary.text: Spirit Walk lasts until you attack or until an enemy is within 30 yards of you. (Witch Doctor Only)
